LpBase::DualExpr::CoeffIt Class Reference

Detailed Description

The iterator iterates over the terms of the expression.

* double s=0;
* for(LpBase::DualExpr::CoeffIt i(e);i!=INVALID;++i)
* s+= *i * dual(i);
*

#include <lemon/lp_base.h>
